title: I Want To Escape The Earth
description:
Description :
        I get embarrassed easily and really want to escape from this earth.This new semester, I met a long-haired, beautiful girl who is the exact opposite of me.Wait, no, it's a handsome guy, and social anxiety doesn't seem to be in his vocabulary! I end up witnessing him doing the most random things in the weirdest places...Ahhhh! I really really want to escape from the earth!
